name: Solitaire Stars - Klondike Card game
description:
This is the #1 Solitaire card game app. Solitaire is a popular and classic single-player card game also known as Klondike Solitaire and Patience. This solitaire app has Klondike Solitaire 1 card and Klondike Solitaire 3 card draw.

See what some of our many users have to say about this popular Solitaire game:

♣ Very fun, simple and addicting!
♣ Easy to play and lot's of fun!
♣ Highly recommended for everyone
♣ Best game and for free! I play this all the time.
♣ I can't stop playing it is soo fun!
♣ Best game on Google Play!
